mapper.select:
select DISTINCT d.id AS "id", d.name AS "name", d.del_flag AS "delFlag", d.remarks AS "remarks" from bm_dist_office a inner join bm_rule_office b on a.office_id=b.office_id inner join bm_rule c on c.id=b.rule_id inner join bm_rule_group d on d.id=c.group_id
a.office_id=#{_parameter}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bm_rule_group( id, name, del_flag, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks} )
